package io.persephone.dsl.element

import io.persephone.dsl.Tag
import io.persephone.dsl.element.*

// generated by HtmlDslGenerator.kt
class VIDEO : Tag(tagName = "video", selfClosing = false) {

	var autoPictureInPicture: String?
		get() = attributes.getOrNull("autoPictureInPicture")
		set(value) {
			value?.let {
				attributes["autoPictureInPicture"] = it
			}
		}

	var controllist: String?
		get() = attributes.getOrNull("controllist")
		set(value) {
			value?.let {
				attributes["controllist"] = it
			}
		}

	var disablePictureInPicture: String?
		get() = attributes.getOrNull("disablePictureInPicture")
		set(value) {
			value?.let {
				attributes["disablePictureInPicture"] = it
			}
		}

	var disableRemotePlayback: String?
		get() = attributes.getOrNull("disableRemotePlayback")
		set(value) {
			value?.let {
				attributes["disableRemotePlayback"] = it
			}
		}

	var dropzone: String?
		get() = attributes.getOrNull("dropzone")
		set(value) {
			value?.let {
				attributes["dropzone"] = it
			}
		}

	var exportparts: String?
		get() = attributes.getOrNull("exportparts")
		set(value) {
			value?.let {
				attributes["exportparts"] = it
			}
		}

	var intrinsicsize: String?
		get() = attributes.getOrNull("intrinsicsize")
		set(value) {
			value?.let {
				attributes["intrinsicsize"] = it
			}
		}

	var spellcheck: String?
		get() = attributes.getOrNull("spellcheck")
		set(value) {
			value?.let {
				attributes["spellcheck"] = it
			}
		}

	var translate: String?
		get() = attributes.getOrNull("translate")
		set(value) {
			value?.let {
				attributes["translate"] = it
			}
		}

	fun source(
		dropzone: String? = null,
		exportparts: String? = null,
		spellcheck: String? = null,
		translate: String? = null,
		init: (SOURCE.() -> Unit)? = null
	) = initTag(SOURCE.(), init).apply {
		this.dropzone = dropzone
		this.exportparts = exportparts
		this.spellcheck = spellcheck
		this.translate = translate
	}

	fun track(
		dropzone: String? = null,
		exportparts: String? = null,
		spellcheck: String? = null,
		translate: String? = null
	) = initTag(TRACK.()).apply {
		this.dropzone = dropzone
		this.exportparts = exportparts
		this.spellcheck = spellcheck
		this.translate = translate
	}

}
